basics.name: Michael Roper
basics.label: Web Platforms Manager
basics.summary: Michael is a proficient Digital Marketer with strong technical skills and a focus on the customer experience across the entire journey, supported by a well-rounded knowledge of brand & product marketing in a B2B context and beyond. With over 15 years industry experience, he has broad skills in Marketing Automation, Inbound lead acquisition, Search Engine Marketing (SEM), Search Engine Optimisation (SEO), Content Management Systems (CMS), User Experience (UX) and Web Performance.

Stakeholder management for key projects across multiple areas of the business.
